module.name: Paging and Intercom
module.changelog: *13.0.26.1* FREEPBX-14577 Paging and Intercom allows to create paging group with empty paging extension field *13.0.26* FREEPBX-12690 add view for destinations usage *13.0.25.5* FREEPBX-14264 Issues in 13 with paging groups containing an * or # *13.0.25.4* FREEPBX-13953 Fix behavior with leading zero *13.0.25.3* FREEPBX-14291 -Paging/Intercom module doesn't retain settings *13.0.25.2* FREEPBX-13591 Add 'OpenStage' autoanswer *13.0.25.1* FREEPBX-13274 validate data not null *13.0.25* Set Volume correctly *13.0.24* Allow settable paging speaker volume (Sangoma phones only) *13.0.23* Generate auto-answer context [originate-aa] for external applications *13.0.22* FREEPBX-12694 Changing Intercom setting from default to recording gives error *13.0.21* Add sound languages: it,fr,en_GB *13.0.20* Table sizing *13.0.19* FREEPBX-12476 Validate data *13.0.18* Cleanup Asterisk less than 11 references *13.0.17* FREEPBX-12325 use proper function for adding sip headers *13.0.16* FREEPBX-8801 Ability to disable intercom on extension *13.0.15* FREEPBX-12060 *13.0.14.2* FREEPBX-11966 FREEPBX-11979 *13.0.14.1* FREEPBX-11929 - Allow UNKNOWN Dahdi devices to be paged *13.0.14* FREEPBX-11833 Move device list to multi select *13.0.13* FREEPBX-11643 Add core hook to clean up extensions when deleted *13.0.12* FREEPBX-11358 getdestinfo for paging groups *13.0.11* FREEPBX-11167 *13.0.10* FREEPBX-9951 Japanese language prompts *13.0.9* Slide out menu, BMO search agent *13.0.8* FREEPBX-9264 Option to disable dsp_drop_silence always enabled for paging calls *13.0.7* FREEPBX-10321 Allow page groups without members *13.0.6* FREEPBX-10133 Dont allow anything but a number *13.0.5* Paging bug when there are no devices *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9931 Allow for multilingual sound structure in remaining OSS modules *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9846 All page groups disappear from list when deleting one *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha4* Add Spanish prompts *13.0.1alpha3* FREEPBX-9478 Can not create page group *13.0.1alpha2* FREEPBX-8397 Different announcement tones per page *13.0.1alpha1* Styling and visual changes *12.0.13* FREEPBX-7508 Invalid character for extension *12.0.12* FREEPBX-6273 Add depends, remove requirements regression *12.0.11* FREEPBX-8796 Generate default paging if no page groups *12.0.10* FREEPBX-8622 Move answer to after the page agi so that we get all devices into the conference first *12.0.9* FREEPBX-8474 Remove duplicate includes from context *12.0.8.1* Add option to force paging through to in-use devices. *12.0.7* Add skeleton support for Multicast RTP *12.0.6* Fix regression where paging wouldn't work with Asterisk 1.8 *12.0.5* Changing the announcement would break auto answer. *12.0.4* Auto-Answer fixes for PJSip and chan_sip *12.0.3* Redo module_hook calls to use static obj *12.0.2* Fix Radio button grouping *12.0.1alpha2* #7112 - Ensure calls are recorded if required. *12.0.1alpha1* Initial Support for PJSip
module.description: Allows creation of paging groups to make announcements using the speaker built into most SIP phones. Also creates an Intercom feature code that can be used as a prefix to talk directly to one person, as well as optional feature codes to block/allow intercom calls to all users as well as blocking specific users or only allowing specific users.
